name: 黃如瑩
objective: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
schedule:
Theme One:  Translation of articles on law
Week 1  Introduction
Week 2  Translation of Article 1
Week 3  Translation of Article 2
Week 4  Translation of Article 3
Week 5  Translation of Article 4
Week 6  Translation of Article 5
Theme Two:  Translation of art and poetry
Week 7  Introduction
Week 8  Translation of the first pair
Week 9  Translation of the second pair
Week 10 Translation of the third pair
Week 11 Translation of the fourth pair
Week 12 Translation of the fifth pair
Theme Three: Translation of academic papers
Week 13 Introduction
Week 14 Translation of Paper 1
Week 15 Translation of Paper 2
Week 16 Translation of Paper 3
Week 17 Translation of Paper 4
Week 18 Wrapping-up
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance: 10%
2. Participation of discussions in class:10%
3. Homework: 60%
4. Correctiona and revision: 20%
